description: Aquatrine is used for a few basic electronic components.

You can find /b/Aquatrine/b/ buried in /6/sand or sandstone near oceans/6/. Usually this means you have to dig underwater, but you can find a bunch burried on /b/beaches/b/, as long as you dig a little.

> --/7/Aquatrine. Quite the elusive gemstone, yet so useful. Sometimes you get lucky and find some on the ocean's floor, exposed to the water. Takes a bit of work to get to though, unless you got some kind of Aqua Affinity./7/--
